[Page Title: LoLA Low Country Louisiana Seafood Kitchen - Park Circle, North Charleston, SC]

× 
Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more!
Catering Packages 
LoLA Low Country Louisiana Seafood Kitchen - Park Circle, North Charleston, SC

4830 O Hear Ave., North Charleston, SC 29405
Visit us at map marker pin 
Low Country Louisiana Seafood Kitchen
About us 
LoLA features Authentic Louisiana Cuisine with a Low Country , Family-Friendly Atmosphere.

Savory items like overstuffed PoBoys, perfectly seasoned Crawfish and Oysters, Flavorful Gumbos, and lots of Cajun Pub Fare.

We invite you to join us for Happy Hour, Tuesday thru Fridays where you can find great discounts on food and drinks.

Our outside patio is pet-friendly so your furry friends are also welcomed.

LoLA is available for full service catering for any special occasion.
Read more about us 
Established in 2016.
History 
Started in 2010

LoLA started as a food truck in 2010 and opened its brick and mortar location in 2016. The food truck can still be found around North Charleston today and is available for full catering services.
Read more about us 
Established in 2016.

Events
Start stop events carousel 
Valentine's Day

Saturday February 14th

Join us on Valentine's Day for the perfect romantic evening!

Reservations are recommended.

Fat Tuesday

Tuesday February 17th

Come celebrate Fat Tuesday with us.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Yelp

Jordan T:
five star review by 
This place is awesome! It has such a cool underground kind of vibe, and everyone is laid-back and cool. There is both inside and outside seating, and because it was a nice night, we sat outside on a bench. Our server was a really nice guy and gave us great recommendations. We ordered some gator bites and some gumbo-style fries, and those were AWESOME...

Review by - Yelp

Ian-n A:
five star review by 
In Charleston for a few hours decided to try Lola's out with my husband ...OMG so glad we did. Great food! Got the gator and raw oysters for appetizer. Gumbo, French dip, and fried oyster po boy for main course. Seriously in heaven ! My husband and I just spent 6 years off the mainland and this was a nice welcome back home to the south lunch...

Review by - Yelp

Brent L:
five star review by 
Wow! Is what I have to say about this place. Came here on a whim and it didn't disappoint. I had the shrimp and crawfish etouffee and loved it immensely. Had great flavor and the portions were great. My wife had the jambalaya and that was great as well. They both came with this cornbread that was out of this world. I have never had such great tasting cornbread...

Review by - Yelp

Juli G:
five star review by 
Did we get lucky. Best food in Charleston so far! Drive a little and get great Cajun food. We have eaten at other places so far and this is by far the BEST. The jambalaya was the great and the bread pudding was well worth the calories. Thr.servers were friendly and the owner wanted to be sure we had a good experience. We will come back!!!

Review by - Yelp

Joe D:
five star review by 
Absolute must! The quaint building is bursting with flavor! Portions are nice, service is impeccable(great job Alison), and the food OMG, the food is fantastic. Cajun cuisine at its finest. I've been here a couple of times and each experience is consistent. The place is clean and very prompt. Great place for a quick lunch or date night. You have to try the swamp water!..

Review by - Google

Patrice B:
five star review by 
Almost made me feel like I was at home
New Orleans the food was almost on the money...that's a plus if you've ever been to the big easy...this is the only restaurant I'll eat out at...worth every hard earned penny...

Newsletter

Location

LoLA Park Circle - North Charleston

4830 O Hear Ave.

North Charleston, SC

29405

LoLA Mount Pleasant

1036 Chuck Dawley Blvd

Mount Pleasant, SC

29464

Hours

LoLA Park Circle - North Charleston

Tuesday & Wednesday 4 - 9

Thursday - Saturday 11:30 - 9

Due to high volume at Park Circle

we are unable to accommodate

To go orders after 6pm on Friday and Saturday.

LoLA Mount Pleasant

Tuesday & Wednesday 4-9

Thursday - Saturday 11:30-9

Gratuity will be added to parties of 6 or more.

The whole party must be present before we seat the table.

All tables have a dine time of 2 hours, in order to accommodate all of our reservations and guests in a timely manner.

Parties of 10+ must be on 1 check

Parties of 15+ require a deposit

Both locations are closed on these holidays: Thanksgiving Thursday Nov. 28 Christmas Eve and Christmas day 24 & 25 New Years December 31 and January 1st
